name: Zapdos ex
author: Ryo Ueda

poke_power.name: Legendary Ascent
poke_power.effect: Once during your turn, when you put Zapdos ex from your hand onto your Bench, you may switch 1 of your Active Pokémon with Zapdos ex. If you do, you may also move any number of basic {L} Energy cards attached to your Pokémon to Zapdos ex.

attacks.name: Electron Crush
attacks.effect: You may discard an Energy card attached to Zapdos ex. If you do, this attack does 50 damage plus 20 more damage.

rule_box: When Pokémon-ex has been Knocked Out, your opponent takes 2 Prize cards.
